Text: RE Morn Meet Shel Everything ok except enron has credible attack threat Cops all in our two buildings Mike said had bomb dogs in gas control Many many cops outside our buildings and in garage Called Linda Laferla at home for a comp day to access our system and monitor just in case Im sure you have already heard all about it Maybe we need to talk to our bunch about it Fireball Howard Original Message From Corman Shelley Sent Friday October AM To Howard Jack Subject Re Morn Meet Is the system running ok this morning Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld wwwBlackBerrynet
